description:
Xposed module that persists Android file picker sort order

Android's file picker (DocumentsUI) resets sort order every time you navigate into a folder. This Xposed module persists your sort preference across directories and sessions.

Features:

  • Tap a sort option to set the global default
  • Long-press a sort option to save per-folder preference
  • Per-folder overrides take priority over global default

Requires official LSPosed framework, Android 11+ and root access.

Supported packages:

  • com.google.android.documentsui (Google Pixel)
  • com.android.documentsui (AOSP)
